mkdir -p ~/mycode/graphing
python3 -m pip install matplotlib
python3 ~/mycode/graphing/graphmaker-hist.py
python3 ~/mycode/graphing/graphmaker-bar.py
python3 ~/mycode/graphing/graphmaker-csvreader.py

vim ~/mycode/graphing/graphmaker-bar.py
vim ~/mycode/graphing/2018summary.csv
vim ~/mycode/graphing/graphmaker-csvreader.py
